title: summA irukkinra
sahitya:
summA irukkinra sUKSmam arindiDin surusuruppenna sholvEn uLLE


anupallavi

  immA nilangaLellAm inidu paDaitt-aLittadum Edonrum saliyAda Adip-paramporuL pOl


caraNam    cidAkAsha veLiyir cittira dIpam pOl cittam alaiyAdu shuddAnma cEtanattil
nidAna sukha ghana dhAtAkara niSTaiyil niratishayAnanda para mOna shAntattil
